subject: Tennis
Davis Cup
lead_paragraph: Andy Roddick was brief and efficient, beating Paul-Henri Mathieu, 6-2, 6-3, 6-2, in 1 hour 37 minutes to give the United States a decisive edge over France.
snippet: Andy Roddick was brief and efficient, beating Paul-Henri Mathieu, 6-2, 6-3, 6-2, in 1 hour 37 minutes to give the United States a decisive edge over France.
